title: Smarts Knowledge Intelligence and Wisdom w/ OMB PEEZY DC Young Fly and Karlous Miller
itunes:title: Smarts Knowledge Intelligence and Wisdom w/ OMB PEEZY DC Young Fly and Karlous Miller
description:
Straight outta Mobile, Alabama OMB Peezy pulled up to the trap to chop it up with Karlous Miller and DC Young Fly. The crew bring the comedy and talk about stories from growing up. You know Karlous and DC Young Fly were class clowns and they tell stories from their glory days in middle school and high school. Plus Karlous Miller tells the story of playing football and the moment he decided not to try to tackle his team's best player. OMB Peezy is on the couch and he chronicles his rap career and explains how E-40 changed the trajectory of his movement. Peezy tells the story of skydiving and Karlous and DC imagine all the wrong sky diving scenarios!


Follow OMB PEEZY https://www.instagram.com/omb_peezy/​


DC and Karlous are touring through the pessimistic and talk about what that experience is like and how they continue to find ways to interact with the fans. DC and Karlous explain the benefits of drinking water in your day and Karlous brings out one of his classic characters to explain the difference between being smart, having knowledge, being intelligent and having wisdom!


#OMBPEEZY​



Hit Our Website for more info: https://www.85southshow.com/​

Get our custom merchandise: https://85apparelco.com/​

Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

WATCH KARLOUS' MILLER's COMEDY SPECIAL! https://vimeo.com/ondemand/karlousmil...​



FOLLOW THE CREW


KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/​

DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/​

CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/​


Director - JOE T. NEWMAN - www.ayoungplayer.com

Producer CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/​

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://instagram.com/cat_corleone_/​

It's Jon - https://www.instagram.com/holaj_o_n/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
